extendedInfo.description: Youâre off to the races in HORSE FRENZY!Just like you remember from the fair, carnival, or arcade! Roll the ball into the holes to race your horse against the opponents, but now with a twist!Not only do you take your horse to the track to race, but you must also train and feed your horses in their stable! Win coins as you race to buy different horses to train and raise them into derby winners! Feed and care for them to become the best trainer in Horse Frenzy! Fun for both kids and adults!Climb the rankings, win your league, and fill your trophy shelf!Features:â© Easy to play, but much to do!â© Collect many different horses, including the cowboy, pirate, ninja, unicorn, princess, black beauty and others, with more to come!â© With each new level gained, more horses are unlocked along with special gifts and power-ups!â© Horses come with special abilities that you can increase with training!â© Receive bonuses during the races!â© Multiple leagues to conquer, with more coming soon!â© Compete against 50+ horses for coins and prizes!â© Feed, train, and race your way to the top!Updates are coming soon!â¨Also check out: Coin Dozer: Halloween Cookie Dozer Coin DozerKeywords:  race, racing, derby, farm, animal, carnival, fair, 3d, fun, easy, new, october, iphone, game circus, ball, november, game, track, roll, physics, fun, new, animals

reviews.title: It\'s fun but...
reviews.comment: Once you get to level 40 you can\'t gain any more experience. There\'s no difference in any of the horses. It was fun for a while but now it\'s time to uninstall these Game Circus games.
reviews.author: Tim McElwee

reviews.title: Get boring
reviews.comment: Every race i went i got first. So what the use of this game? It very easy to get first with the normal horse i have. When normal horse make me get first,what the use of getting the best horse and earning coin? Do look in my problem
reviews.author: Jane Teh

reviews.title: Triff game but???
reviews.comment: Fourth time playing through this game, so guess i kinda like it then huh??? But what has happened to it, its bogged down with intrusive ads taking you away from the game screen. Arrgh SO ANNOYING!!!! Losing a star due to this
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I enjoy the game but...
reviews.comment: Game keeps forceclosing, hence loss of 1 star; drops another star because there is room for improvement - I don\'t know why I\'m training horses but if I swap for another to speed up game play (which is otherwise too slow) and later revert back to it then the training has gone back down. I also think you should be able to retrieve horses you\'ve used previously for fewer coins
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: My daughter really likes this game. I just wish it were easier to collect money and bring able to do more races before having to rest would be nice.
reviews.author: Amanda De Shano

reviews.title: Something is wrong!!!
reviews.comment: It won\'t download this game on my LG Samsung phone....oh well I guess it\'s one star for now!!!
reviews.author: Sheneitha Mcneil

reviews.title: An Awsome pin ball game
reviews.comment: It is so cool but they need to take away some sleeping time for the horses.
reviews.author: Annie Gonzales

reviews.comment: Installed this game for my 9 year old daughter and she loves it! It\'s a great game for younger kids!
reviews.author: Angie Halvorson

reviews.title: Gutting,like wafting a carrot in front of donkey (horse lol)
reviews.comment: This is was a great game (even though you have to find out for youself on how to play it)loved trying to get the trophys and get to the next level but now i find out it only goes to level 40 i was on this everyday now im going to have to uninstall try and fix it please .
reviews.author: Beverley Gage

reviews.comment: Love it just would be nice to be able to keep all the horses you purchase and all there accomplishments instead of two and loose everything u advanced along with them.
reviews.author: Lissa Granger

reviews.title: Good time killer
reviews.comment: Not really hard but just wish you could get more than 2 races on a full stength horse but maybe that will come in higher levels.
reviews.author: Tony Malone

reviews.title: great fun
reviews.comment: yes remember this from thw old days, agree would like to know what the items do
reviews.author: Tom Steadman

reviews.title: Cute!
reviews.comment: This game is so cute. :)  But once I get back from a race a bunch of ads pop up and its a little annoying but I love playing it! Because I never have to come back its always constant playing!:)
reviews.author: Caroline Beelman

reviews.title: Addicted
reviews.comment: It isn\'t a game for people that need to best everyone in real life, but it passes time, and I enjoy skeeball, and not getting screwed at the fairs!!! I may not bring stupid stuff home when I play, but I still enjoy it!!!
reviews.author: jenna Duskey

reviews.title: Ehhh But Good
reviews.comment: Kinda fun but its just that its really easy to win and the other horses are SUPER slow but other than that its a really fun game and easy too \342\231\241\342\230\206:)
reviews.author: Ashley Castaneda

reviews.title: Nicole Benedict
reviews.comment: The game seems to be fun and something I would really like to keep playing. But ever since I got to level 5 every time I finsih a race it force closes. So I will not be playing til this is fixed. Will keep app if alittle while to wait to see if this problem is fixed. If not fixed will be getting rid of the app.
reviews.author: Nicole Benedict

reviews.title: Fun way to pass the time
reviews.comment: Its a very good game. Quick to work out and very fun. Sometimes the simple games are the best! :-)
reviews.author: Ducky Gooch

reviews.title: Perfect game
reviews.comment: This game is just all around awesome never freezes or anything like that you would be crazy not to give it a 5 star rating
reviews.author: Tommy Andrews

reviews.title: Hourse frenzy
reviews.comment: Addictive game, why not sure..lol.. kinda childess and slow playing/earnings... but regardless I like it... better graphical interaction would be great maybe the chance to earn/buy better skeet balls.. def download
reviews.author: Amanda Calvert

reviews.comment: Fun game...would be much better if there was a help screen so u had a better idea on how to play.  Example...when to use the dumbbell...what it does.  Do u lose the horse u have been training when u buy a new one?  U have to just guess how to play!
reviews.author: Rachel England
